# Unstandardized
## fit a model
```{r, include = FALSE}
library(lavaan)

model <- '
  m ~ a * x
  y ~ b * m
  ab := a * b
'

set.seed(123)
n <- 100
x <- runif(n)
m <- 0.5 * x + rnorm(n)
y <- 0.7 * m + rnorm(n)
dat <- data.frame(x, m, y)

fit1 <- sem(model, data = dat, se="boot",bootstrap = 2000,iseed = 1234)
fit2 <- sem(model, data = dat)
```


##  result for lavaan::parameterestimates()
```{r}
parameterestimates(fit1, ci=TRUE)
```

```{r}
```

## result for semboottools::parameterEstimates_boot()
```{r}
library(semboottools)
fit2 <- store_boot(fit2, R=2000,iseed = 1234)
parameterEstimates_boot(fit2)
```
